data.lyric:
[ti:Cold Beer Calling My Name]
[ar:Jameson Rodgers/Luke Combs]
[al:Cold Beer Calling My Name]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Cold Beer Calling My Name - Jameson Rodgers/Luke Combs
[00:04.65]Lyrics by：Jameson Rodgers/Hunter Phelps/Brett Tyler/Alysa Vanderheym
[00:09.31]Composed by：Jameson Rodgers/Hunter Phelps/Brett Tyler/Alysa Vanderheym
[00:13.97]It's been one of them clock it in knock it out clock it out
[00:17.64]'Bout to kick off the weekend
[00:20.52]There's a stretch of blacktop I ain't never seen a cop
[00:23.71]So I'm pushing it a little past ten
[00:27.42]Pulled a little money from the bank put it in the tank
[00:31.15]Shined up the windshield glass
[00:33.90]Don't know where the night might lead ain't nowhere to be
[00:37.87]But I gotta get there fast
[00:39.90]There's a cold beer calling my name
[00:43.11]Feel a good time coming got a new song humming
[00:46.80]And the sunset's doing its thing
[00:49.57]Feeling lucky as a seven yeah sometimes Heaven
[00:52.94]Is a pocket full of payday green
[00:56.07]And my baby putting sugar on me
[00:58.92]Yeah it's sure been a pretty damn good day
[01:02.45]And there's a cold beer calling my name yeah
[01:12.38]If there's a hillbilly rock show I'll be in the front row
[01:15.96]Holding up a red Bic flame
[01:18.89]Or a wraparound porch with a citronella torch
[01:22.00]Yeah you know I'm down either way
[01:25.35]There's a chance that tonight might be a night that we
[01:29.64]Ain't ever gonna forget
[01:31.85]Yeah everybody's turning it up I got a little buzz
[01:36.13]And I ain't even had one yet
[01:38.49]There's a cold beer calling my name
[01:41.49]Feel a good time coming got a new song humming
[01:45.04]And the sunset's doing its thing
[01:47.97]Feeling lucky as a seven yeah sometimes Heaven
[01:51.44]Is a pocket full of payday green
[01:54.30]And my baby putting sugar on me
[01:57.36]Yeah it's sure been a pretty damn good day
[02:00.86]And there's a cold beer calling my name
[02:03.75]It's calling my name
[02:08.78]Yeah there's a cold beer calling my name
[02:13.25]Oh yeah it is
[02:17.20]Yeah I'm gonna put a little chill in my weekend
[02:21.14]Stay up all night maybe sleep in
[02:24.35]I'm gonna sip a little something
[02:26.84]And I ain't gotta worry 'bout nothing 'cause
[02:30.31]There's a cold beer calling my name
[02:34.02]Cold beer calling my name
[02:36.58]There's a cold beer calling my name
[02:39.86]Feel a good time coming got a new song humming
[02:43.30]And the sunset's doing its thing
[02:46.26]Feeling lucky as a seven yeah sometimes Heaven
[02:49.70]Is a pocket full of payday green
[02:52.65]And my baby putting sugar on me
[02:55.75]Yeah it's sure been a pretty damn good day
[02:59.35]And there's a cold beer calling my name
[03:02.28]It's calling my name
[03:06.34]Cold beer calling my name
[03:08.61]It's calling my name
[03:13.03]Yeah I'm gonna put a little chill in my weekend
data.trans:
[ti:Cold Beer Calling My Name]
[ar:Jameson Rodgers/Luke Combs]
[al:Cold Beer Calling My Name]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.65]//
[00:09.31]//
[00:13.97]我是忙碌的上班族当中的一员
[00:17.64]下班以后 尽情享受周末时光
[00:20.52]行走在宽敞的柏油路上 我没有看见警察
[00:23.71]所以我加大油门 一路狂飙
[00:27.42]从银行里取了一点钱 给车子加满油
[00:31.15]把挡风玻璃擦得一尘不染
[00:33.90]不知道今晚会怎样 我无处可去
[00:37.87]但是我会尽快赶去
[00:39.90]冰镇啤酒正在呼唤我的名字
[00:43.11]感觉快乐时光即将来临 我哼着新歌
[00:46.80]夕阳西下 绚烂无比
[00:49.57]感觉好运当头 有时天堂就是
[00:52.94]满口袋装着发薪日拿到的工资
[00:56.07]我的爱人对我说着甜言蜜语
[00:58.92]这一定是无比美好的一天
[01:02.45]冰镇啤酒正在呼唤我的名字
[01:12.38]如果乡村摇滚演出拉开序幕 我会坐在前排
[01:15.96]举起手里的红色打火机
[01:18.89]亦或是拿着环绕式门廊上装点的香茅火炬
[01:22.00]你知道无论怎样 我都沉浸其中
[01:25.35]今晚很有可能成为
[01:29.64]我们永生难忘的美好夜晚
[01:31.85]大家都热情洋溢 我有点醉醺醺的
[01:36.13]可我还没开始喝酒
[01:38.49]冰镇啤酒正在呼唤我的名字
[01:41.49]感觉快乐时光即将来临 我哼着新歌
[01:45.04]夕阳西下 绚烂无比
[01:47.97]感觉好运当头 有时天堂就是
[01:51.44]满口袋装着发薪日拿到的工资
[01:54.30]我的爱人对我说着甜言蜜语
[01:57.36]这一定是无比美好的一天
[02:00.86]冰镇啤酒正在呼唤我的名字
[02:03.75]呼唤着我的名字
[02:08.78]冰镇啤酒正在呼唤我的名字
[02:13.25]就是如此
[02:17.20]周末时光 我要好好放松一下
[02:21.14]彻夜狂欢 也许会睡过头
[02:24.35]我要喝点美酒
[02:26.84]我一点也不会担心
[02:30.31]冰镇啤酒正在呼唤我的名字
[02:34.02]冰镇啤酒呼唤着我的名字
[02:36.58]冰镇啤酒正在呼唤我的名字
